mapper.insert: insert into members(member_name, member_email, member_tel, member_pwd, member_gender, rank_no, join_date) values(#{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberTel}, password(#{memberPWD}), #{memberGender}, 2, now())
mapper.select: select mbs.member_no, mbs.rank_no, mrk.rank_name from members mbs left join ranks mrk on mrk.rank_no = mbs.rank_no where mbs.member_email=#{memberEmail} and mbs.member_pwd=password(#{memberPWD})
mapper.update: update members set member_tel = #{memberTel}, trainer_no=#{trainerNo} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select mbs.member_no, mbs.rank_no, mrk.rank_name from members mbs left join ranks mrk on mrk.rank_no = mbs.rank_no where mbs.member_no = ${value}
